title: Someone is trying to sell this account
body:
Hey someone added me and said do you want to buy this account.
they said you can log onto the forums to prove its legit.
ahahahhaha what an idiot 
Riot please ban this account

replies.body:
You just posted a link to a boosting website, please gtfo.
Don't make excuse now.
Well if you have a screenshot of it, you can probably send a support ticket for a report.

heh i sent 100s of support tickets from an account "sold" to me...all that did was get me IP blocked for a few weeks and the owner of the account got it back and sold in for 100 bucks a week later. gg rito.

> heh i sent 100s of support tickets from an account "sold" to me...all that did was get me IP blocked for a few weeks and the owner of the account got it back and sold in for 100 bucks a week later. gg rito.

Wait, you bought an account?
